moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Middle right front punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 90° left on the left foot to face 9 o'clock. Bring the right foot backwards into walking stance. Left outer forearm low block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock with right foot into walking stance. Middle right front punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 90° left on the left foot to face 6 o'clock. Bring the right foot backwards into walking stance. Left outer forearm low block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock with right foot into walking stance. Middle right front punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 90° left on the left foot to face 3 o'clock. Bring the right foot backwards into walking stance. Left outer forearm low block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock with right foot into walking stance. Middle right front punch with kihap.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Step right foot backwards to parallel ready stance facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with left foot into walking stance. Middle left front punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 90° right on the right foot to face 3 o'clock. Bring the left foot backwards into walking stance. Right outer forearm low block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock with left foot into walking stance. Middle left front punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 90° right on the right foot to face 6 o'clock. Bring the left foot backwards into walking stance. Right outer forearm low block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock with left foot into walking stance. Middle left front punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 90° right on the right foot to face 9 o'clock. Bring the left foot backwards into walking stance. Right outer forearm low block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock with left foot into walking stance. Middle left front punch with kihap.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Bring left foot backwards to parallel ready stance.
